mapper.insert: insert into ummenuitem (MENUITEMID, MENUID, CAPTION, SHOWTYPE, PAGETYPE, JSFUNCTION, OBJECTID, ICONFILE, SHOWORDER, PARAMAP, TARGET, REFMENUID, MEMO) values (#{menuitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caption,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pagetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jsfunction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconfile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paramap,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refmenuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ummenuitem set MENUID = #{menuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAPTION = #{caption,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOWTYPE = #{showtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAGETYPE = #{pagetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JSFUNCTION = #{jsfunction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJECTID = #{objectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICONFILE = #{iconfile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOWORDER = #{showorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PARAMAP = #{paramap,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TARGET = #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REFMENUID = #{refmenuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MENUITEMID = #{menuitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select MENUITEMID, MENUID, CAPTION, SHOWTYPE, PAGETYPE, JSFUNCTION, OBJECTID, ICONFILE, SHOWORDER, PARAMAP, TARGET, REFMENUID, MEMO from ummenuitem where MENUITEMID = #{menuitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
